title: 299F.01 FIRE MARSHAL.
text:
[Repealed, 2014 c 212 art 3 s 1]
A division in the Department of Public Safety to be known as the Division of Fire Marshal is hereby created, under the supervision and control of the state fire marshal, to whom shall be assigned the duties and responsibilities described in this chapter. The commissioner may place the fire marshal's position in the unclassified service if the position meets the criteria of section 43A.08, subdivision 1a.
[Repealed, 1996 c 310 s 1]
